item.description:
The Strand Theatre is doing a movie classics theme in July and August with Jaws, West Side Story, Raiders of the Lost Ark, etc. Movies are on Monday nights and all shows start at 7 pm. We'll meet outside the theater at 6:30 PM.

The Strand sells sandwiches, pizza, and the usual movie snacks along with soft drinks and beer. Clinton also has a few restaurants and pubs that people can meet at after the film.

If you need to reach me, feel free to call my cell phone at 508-981-0455.

Here is the Summer Schedule:
July 12 - Jaws
July 19 - To Kill a Mockingbird
July 26 - West Side Story
August 2 - Ghostbusters
August 9 - Titanic
August 16 - Raiders of the Lost Ark

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Summer Movie Classics - Raiders of the Lost Ark
